useModule.name: Use Module
useModule.hint: Enable or disable the use of modules

behaviorTokens.name: Behavior
behaviorTokens.hint:
Configure what tokens the module should consider to determine occlusion mode.
Default is to include tokens that are both active and controlled.

behaviorParty.name: Behavior Party
behaviorParty.hint: Configure if the module should consider party members for occlusion mode, or only the controlled tokens.

behaviorGM.name: Behavior GM
behaviorGM.hint: Configure if the module should be active for the GM as well
